text: Geisenhausen is a municipality with market town status in Landshut, in Bavaria, Germany. It is 14 km southeast of Landshut in the valley of the Kleine Vils. == Administrative division == *Albanstetten *Diemannskirchen *Hörlkam *Hermannskirchen *Holzhausen *Geisenhausen *Salksdorf *Johannesbergham *Westersbergham *Stephansbergham *Irlach == Famous citizens == * Günter Eich (1907-1972), writer * Martin Flörchinger (1909–2004), actor * Thomas Schmid (1960), writer * Johannes Schmid (1973), stage director == References == == Other websites == * Category:Landshut (district)
title: Geisenhausen
